info:
Feats:
Magic initate
> You learn two cantrips of your choice from that class’s spell list.
> And some other shit

Telekinetic
> As a bonus action you can shove a creature you can see within 30ft towards or away from you by 5ft, 
> target must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier 
> of the score increased by this feat). A creature can willingly fail this save.
> Improved Wisdom by 1
> Mage hand range +30ft

Potions
Common healing potion: 2d4 + 2 
Can consume as a bonus action
Can give to someone else as an action

Can get a +2 AC shield thing for 45 platinum at a cool shop somewhere in the underdark

Aliases:
Agemar in Underdark

Mage of the mountain (Pronounced mage-eye)

Teleportation coords:
Armstess mines
Library of Nass-tun

Tiefling features:
> Within 60 ft, treat dim light as bright, darkness as dim light
> Fire resistance

Hermit feature:
> I'm along bcause fucking people man

Animal Messenger
Fold a paper into an origami swan, give it a target and it'll go there and deliver the message

Far scribe names:

Proficeint:
>Light armor
>Medium amor
>Sheilds
>Simple weapons
>Herbalism Pack
>Tools: Theives', Tiker's

Languages:
>Common
>Infernal
>Sylvan

>Wand of flaring


Equipment:
> Bag of Holdin
> Rye's ashes
> Notebook Contents
>  Runes of Renheim teleportation circle
>3 magical tomes from a demonologist
>  1) Magic book with text to speech (sassy), with info on demons and devils
>  2) Genie Book
>  3) Documentation of a devil known as "Ra??ion", new spells but in abyssal
>Textbooks on magical poisons
>Magic Quill that can write from a distance
>Studded Leather armor
>Weapons
>20 bolts
>Arcane focus (Ring on my hand) 
>Dungoneers pack
>Winter blacket
>Herbalism kit
>Set of common clothes
> Fireball necklace with 5 charges
>Black hooded neophyte robes -  +1 to your spell save DC
>Necklace of undead can't see me
>Sea-Breeze Wave Resistant Beanie
> 2x Scroll that can do any spell of 8th level or lower

>I'm here to spread my own wisdom and seek new wisdom out
>Emotions mean nothing, only logic matters
name: Ghost
